typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['*.*'],
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> parquetdatafromADLS
parquetdatafromADLS sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'mycontainer01',
	folderPath: 'delta',
	truncate:true,
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Id'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> DeltaTableinADLS
